# Intuition

> Intuition is a permissionless protocol for creating verifiable, tokenized attestations. It enables developers to build context-aware applications using semantic triples (subject-predicate-object relationships) backed by economic incentives through bonding curves.

## Introduction

- [Introduction](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs): Intuition at a glance and core value proposition
- [Getting Started](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/getting-started): Start building with Intuition

## Primitives

- [Atoms](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-concepts/atoms): Individual claims and pieces of information stored on-chain
- [Triples](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-concepts/triples): Subject-predicate-object relationships connecting atoms
- [Signals](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-concepts/signals): Economic mechanisms for agreement and disagreement
- [Identities](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-concepts/identities): Decentralized identity system

## Quick Start

- [Quickstart Guide](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/quick-start): Get up and running with Intuition
- [First App](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/getting-started/first-app): Build your first Intuition application

## Economics

- [Bonding Curves](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-concepts/economics/bonding-curves): How dynamic pricing works in Intuition
- [Fees & Rewards](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-concepts/economics/fees-and-rewards): Protocol fee structure and reward distribution

## Developer Tools

- [SDK Overview](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-sdk): TypeScript/JavaScript SDKs for protocol interaction
- [GraphQL API](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/graphql-api/overview): Query the Intuition knowledge graph
- [Smart Contracts](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-smart-contracts): Core protocol contracts and architecture
- [Contract Interactions](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/interaction-guide/overview): Low-level contract interaction patterns
- [Protocol Package](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/protocol): Low-level protocol interactions

## Network & Infrastructure

- [Intuition Network](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-network): Layer 3 blockchain overview
- [Intuition Node](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/intuition-node): Run your own Intuition node

## Tutorials

- [Tutorials Overview](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/tutorials): Step-by-step guides for building with Intuition
- [GraphQL Queries](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/tutorials/queries/activity-feeds): Learn to query the knowledge graph

- [FAQ](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/resources/faq): Frequently asked questions

## Contributing

- [Contribution Guidelines](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/contribution-guidelines): How to contribute to Intuition

## Experimental Applications

- [Portal Guide](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/portal): Complete guide to using The Portal
- [Farcaster Frames](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/experimental-applications/farcaster-frames): Build Intuition-powered Farcaster frames
- [MetaMask Snap](https://docs.intuition.systems/docs/experimental-applications/metamask-snap): Intuition integration for MetaMask
